author: A_Brickset_user
title: Great, if you don't mind a little noise
review: We have all the sets in this series - my children (aged 1, 8,10) all love them. The only down side is that they come with 4 songs programmed in and you can get a add on with another 4 songs, however after a while 8 different songs become a little repeatative (well to adults)
